typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Id FROM sf.[REC DonnÃ©es Account]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceSfAccount
sourceSfAccount keyGenerate(output(Id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 split(ERROR_FUNCTION('SurrogateKey1@Id lessOrEquals 1000'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Incluses, )
ConditionalSplit1@Incluses sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkSfAccount
